title: People With Certain Medical Conditions And Covid-19 Risk Factors
content:
Mental health conditions
Mood disorders including depression and schizophrenia spectrum disorders.
Get more information:
National Institute of Mental Health (NIMH) Shareable Resources on Coping with COVID-19
National Institute of Mental Health (NIMH) Depression
Mood Disorders
Overweight and obesity
Overweight (defined as a
body mass index
(BMI) of25 kg/m
2
or higher, but under 30 kg/m
2
), obesity (BMI is 30 kg/m
2
or higher, but under 40 kg/m
2
), or severe obesity (BMI is 40 kg/m
2
